column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Iran : will Israel strike first ?
#Text=With Iran , do you think that Israel would ever need to act unilaterally again , to make a strike , in response to their nuclear capabilities ?

#Text=The U.S. National Intelligence Estimate , which is quite controversial , said that they ’ve stopped their nuclear weapons program , yet there are many centrifuges in Natanz that are still producing material .
#Text=First of all about intelligence .
#Text=One must understand the nature of intelligence .
#Text=Intelligence is an organization to report and not to prophesize .
#Text=They are not prophets and they do n’t claim to be .
#Text=They are experts on what has happened ; you ca n’t ask them to be expert on what may happen because the best intelligence person in America will never have a Persian mind .
#Text=So how can you know how the mind acts ?
#Text=Do n’t expect them .
#Text=What will finally bring down the danger of Iran is the Iranians themselves ; they are sick and tired .
#Text=Ahmadinejad almost replaced Allah with enriched Uranium .
#Text=It becomes a holy profession .
#Text=“ We are enriching uranium ! ”
#Text=What are you enriching uranium , what for ?
#Text=If you try to use it , you will be hit .
#Text=Are you saying the Iranian people will be the agents of change ?
#Text=Yes .
#Text=But there was so much hope for Mohammad Khatami and yet his administration ended up a disappointment --
#Text=Yes .
#Text=There are hopes that become disappointments .
#Text=It does n’t mean you do n’t have to try again .
#Text=But the Iranian people seem to be rallying around their nuclear program .
#Text=With Iran , we shall do what we have to do in our own way .
#Text=We do n’t want to bother anybody because it ’s a world problem .
#Text=Until now , the problem was will the world stand on the side of Israel .
#Text=Today , the question is will the world stand on the side of the world ?
#Text=Iran is a world danger .
#Text=—
#Text=On the possibility of an Israeli strike against Iran .
#Text=You ’re only as great as your word , do n’t forget .
#Text=But the Iranian economy cannot hold it and they are mobilizing the world against them .
#Text=Gradually .
#Text=Every time more and more .
#Text=The world is sick and tired .
#Text=Finally , the world will have to decide if we live in a world with nuclear devices that can fall in the hands of terrorists or we are going to organize ourselves against this danger .
#Text=So I will be very careful not to describe Iran as an Israeli problem .
#Text=It ’s a world problem and Israel must be sanguine about it .
#Text=Keep cool .
#Text=As part of a coalition ?
#Text=If they want us , yes .
#Text=But we shall not insist .
#Text=We are naturally in the coalition ; I do n’t know if we shall be formally .
